title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Don't expect market swings to bail out pension funds."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
